revision.comment: Omega moved page [[Arcadyan VRV7006AW22-A-GR]] to [[Arcadyan VRV7006AW22]]
revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Arcadyan |model=VRV7006A |revision=W22-A-GR |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=09/16/2016 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability=now |type=dsl modem, wireless router |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v= |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Lantiq |cpu1_model=PSB 80221;VRX220, xDSL CPE VR9; |cpu1_cspeed=500 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX30LF1GE8AB-TI |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4T1G164QG-BCF7 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43217 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags=ADSL2+, VDSL2 |addl_chips=FXS chips;Lantiq;PEF 41068;V1.2, XWAY SLIC110;1; ,,, xDSL Line Driver;Lantiq;PSB 80190;;1; |stock_boot=U-Boot; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.32.42; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} "P/N: 141700620000J" and "R0.1" is silkscreened on the board. :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/ANATEL/02163-15-02386/ ANATEL/02163-15-02386/] (2016-09-16)
*[https://www.tripleoxygen.net/wiki/modem/vrv7006aw22-a-gr ''Arcadyan VRV7006AW22-A-GR'' on '''03 Labs''' wiki] :CPU: Lantiq xDSL CPE VR9; rev 00019556 (MIPS 34Kc);
